# Sklik.cz

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="300"
  type="sklik"
  json='{ "zoneId": 0, "w": 300, "h": 300 }'
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For semantics of configuration, please see [Sklik.czdocumentation](https://napoveda.sklik.cz/partner/reklamni-kod/).

Supported parameters:

-   `width`
-   `height`
-   `json`
